wikipedia_page.main: Michael Worrall (birth unknown) is a former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1970s, 1980s and 1990s. He played at representative level for Great Britain, and at club level for Oldham, Salford and Leeds, as a second-row, or loose forward, i.e. number 11 or 12, or 13.
